thread.title: Monty AndSusan Scott
thread.title_full: Extra Space Storage reviewed by Monty AndSusan Scott

author: Monty AndSusan Scott
title: Monty AndSusan Scott
text: Would like to give a shout out to anyone needing storage for their belongings anytime soon please drop by at Extra Space Storage on Mid Cities in Euless and stop in to see Joe Watson. These folks are genuine and truly care about your experience with them. It is right around the corner from us and they helped our decision tremendously to make this our storage unit. Thanks again Joe, if I remember correctly, April is a very nice lady and what a computer whiz she is. Thanks again!
